transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] aapko expect hai kya.
Halo?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji Muhammad Ali Naved ji se baat ho rahi hai from Alina International.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan sir ek important discussion karna hai sir aapse main business manager baat kar raha hoon sir Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan main dekh raha hoon sir aapki services chal rahi hai with IndiaMART.
To aap hi dekhte hain sir isko ya koi aur dekhta hai aapke alava.
Customer: Main hi dekhta hoon.
Executive: Okay to main dekh raha tha sir ye jo products hain aapke one second.
Abhi jaise na aapke paas sir kuch direct calls aati hain to main dekh raha tha ki usme kuch calls na miss ho rahi hain isliye maine socha ek baar main khud connect karu aapse aur samjhu ki kya chal raha hai.
Customer: Aisa hai sir to koi miss nahi hua hai call aaj tak.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kyunki main hi usko phone to mere hi paas rehta hai.
Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur jis cheez ko maine call kiya hai waha se koi response nahi mil raha tha to isliye maine isko band karwane ka decision liya tha.
Executive: Jaise sir main dekh raha hoon na aapne sirf ek number add kiye hue hai I think jispe ye baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hai na main aapko suggest karunga sir ki isme at least aap na do number to add kijiye sir.
Customer: Ab to khair wo sab position nahi hai ab to main aisa hai ki ise band karwana tha mujhe maine aapke service center mein phone bhi kiya tha customer care pe.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ise band karane ke teen char din meri baat chit ho gayi hai.
To bas aap.
Executive: Haan wo maine dekha sir maine dekha tabhi maine socha.
Customer: Aap ek favor kiye sir ise band kara dijiye hamara.
Executive: Sir actually ye main aapka jo services hai ye almost sir June matlab five to six months ho chuke hain sir aapki services ko.
Customer: To 27 June ka hai July August September October November paanch mahina ho gaya.
Executive: Paanch mahine ho gaye hain na aur ye jo aapka product line hai sir men common cotton shirts men shirts denim jeans hai na ye to aise products hain sir jinka IndiaMART pe agar main total jo hamare paas buyleads approve hoti hain sir for example ye men cotton shirts ho gaya ya men denim jeans ho gaya sir iska overall agar mahine ke basis pe dekhu to do do dhai dhai hajar buyleads sir approve hoti hain ye ek aisa category hai.
Customer: Experience achcha nahi raha aapke sath main yahi kahunga.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: To aap mera band karwa de sir badi meharbani hogi aapki.
Executive: Sir main aapko yahi suggest karunga sir ki ye it is too early to decide main aapko yahi suggest karunga sir ki agar hum ispe na kuch cheeze hain main ek baar aapke jo account manager hai main unko thoda.
Customer: Sir main sara kuch karke dekh liya har tarah se isme bahut bahut waqt mera barbad hua.
Bahut waqt diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aise mat boliye barbad kuch nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Barbad hua sir dekhiye aisa hai na ye bahas ka mudda nahi hai sir aap se baat kar rahe hain isliye main aapse keh raha hoon please favor kijiye mera ise band kara dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir dekhiye aap bhi jab IndiaMART pe aaye honge sir to aapke dimag mein ye nahi hoga ki mujhe services ko band karna hai sir aap bhi ye soch ke aaye honge ki mujhe.
Customer: Agar mujhe 1% bhi iska response milta na aapke yaha se jitna maine time isko diya jitna maine call kiya party ko sab kuch kiya ekdam fake information humko aage se mili ekdam fake information koi kehta hai ki sir main to aise hi mazak mein dal diya tha mujhe zarurat nahi hai koi keh raha hai ki main aapse baad mein baat karunga koi keh raha hai ki sir wo to maine isme dhai hajar jo aapko dikh raha hai main 250 likha tha zero shayad badh gaya maine kaha 250 ki hi baat kar lo usko bhi wo baat karne ko nahi tayar to bilkul ekdam aisa mujhe feel hua ki bilkul fake hai aur aisa kuch hai nahi jo dikhta hai platform pe ki wo jo hai itni zarurat hai logon ko itne piece ki zarurat hai ye hai wo hai isse achcha experience sir mujhe alibaba.com pe raha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Sir aap samjhiye dekhiye hum bhi na aisa nahi hai ki kya bolte hain matlab hum bhi sir market mein purane hain sir aaj ki date mein agar aap dekhoge to overall.
Executive: Aapke baat karne ke andaz se ho raha hai mujhe ki aap achche vyakti hai aur aapne bahut zyada market mein apna waqt diya hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm inkar nahi kar rahe hain kyunki main bhi roz main bhi apne yaha do char logon ko marketing ke liye rakhte hua hoon.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm ye log jaate hain marketing karte hain unka analyze bhi main dekhta hoon unko analyze bhi karta hoon sab aapke baat chit se mujhe laga nahi aap kafi bahut badhiya aadmi hai bahut achcha kaam kar rahe hain hamare liye ek achcha kaam sir kar dijiye ki aap mera favor karte hue isko band kar dijiye.
Executive: Sir main aapko batau sir maine sabse pehla cheez jo dekha na agar na aisa hota sir ki IndiaMART pe buyleads nahi hai business nahi hai aapki jo product line hai usme aapko trust me sir mere main na ye call bhi nahi karta kyunki sir dekhiye hum bhi ek public listed platform hai sir profitable company hai aur quarter on quarter hum grow kar rahe hain sir ab dekhiye yaha par mujhe na do teen cheeze hain jo gaps mere ko dikh rahe hain jaise kuch calls bhale wo bahut negligible ho but wo for example miss hue.
Customer: Agar 8 baje subah se pehle koi call aati hai to use receive nahi karta hoon main.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to working hours ke beech mein hi lete hain hum ji ji aur plus main dekh raha hoon sir ye jo aapke products hain jaise ye men cotton shirt hai I understand sir ki aap bolenge ki yaar ye itne time se kyun nahi hua to maine dekha sir ki aapka men cotton shirt mein jo group hai aapka isme 16 products added hain men shirt mein humne koi primary category add nahi kiya hua hai to mujhe aisa lagta hai ki aapko shayad pehle bhi bola gaya hoga ki catalog mein kuch cheeze hain jiske upar kaam karne ki zarurat hai main aapse sir yahi suggest karunga ki aap agar 15-20 minute.
Customer: Hamare sath kya hua tha jab hamari aapke logon se baat chit hui thi to unhone kaha tha main platform khud bana ke dunga aapki designing main karunga aur un logon ne hame santusht kiya ki aapki designing achchi ho gayi aur aapka listing bhi ho gaya sara kuch ho gaya aur aise aapko karna hai jaise jaise in logon ne guide kiya main waise waise karta raha aur karte karte pichle main aapko batau lumsam do mahina se main ek do logon se aapse ek pallavi madam karke unse bhi baat hui to unko bhi request maine kiya ki mam mujhe koi response nahi mil raha hai to ise aap hamara band kara dijiye to fir wo idhar udhar ki baatein karne lagi isme time waste hua ye aaj paanchwa mahina chal raha hai 27 tarikh ko paanch mahina pura ho jayega to sir bas main aapse ek antim request yahi karunga ki help kar dijiye mera isko band kara dijiye.
Executive: Sir sir dekhiye maine aapko bataya na ki isme kuch cheeze hain sir dekhiye yaha par na I understand aapka na ye jo abhi mindset hai sir ye completely opposite direction mein ja sakta hai agar if you get one order sir aur maine main aapko sir abhi aap online hote main aapko dikhata sir mere paas bahut sare suppliers hain jinse bahut achcha relation hai aaj ki date mein and they are using higher services to unka journey aur aapka journey agar main compare karunga na sir aap jis level tak pahunche hain na sir six months mein unko usi same level tak wo dhai saal lage the ab us time sir internet ka penetration us level ka nahi tha aur aap ye mat sochiye sir ki aap ispe effort dal rahe hain aur wo waste ja raha hai aisa nahi hai sir aapka directly aur indirectly marketing ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Chaliye koi nahi abhi filhal filhal ise aap band kara dijiye aage fir kabhi mood banega to dekh lunga sir theek hai sir.
Executive: Sir sir actually wo jo time period hota hai na dekhiye waise to hamare yaha is tarike ka koi policy nahi hai sir agar lekin aapne ye within 15 days bhi agar aapne bola hota to main ek baar usko check karta sir.
Customer: Abhi to paanch months ka time.
Executive: Haan haan nahi teen mahina dekhiye teen mahina dekha teen mahina mein kuch na kuch response agar milta to aaj hum aur aap aisi baatein na karte.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul to abhi aaj ki date mein sir agar possible ho jae aapse to mera band.
Executive: Sir main main mana nahi karta sir main bilkul mana nahi karta dekhiye hardly aapne ye jo amount jo bhi aapne pay kiya hai sir mujhe ye malum hai sir ki.
Executive: Hai isliye kyunki hamare paas hamare repeat sellers jo hain wo onboard ho rahe hain.
Customer: Chaliye koi nahi in sab baaton ko khatam kijiye mera kara dijiye kuch log baithe hue hain aapka beech mein call aa gaya namaz ka bhi waqt ho raha hai to aap ise dekh liye mera.
Executive: Koi nahi sir aap ha aap aap se main dobara ek baar connect karta hoon main team ko bolta hoon sir there are certain things sir jo mujhe aisa lagta hai follow karenge.
Customer: Koi fayda nahi hai dekhiye main ab ispe nahi kar paunga aap ise band kara dijiye thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close the IndiaMART service.

- Did not receive expected responses from leads.

- Feels the information received was fake.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of continuing services.

- Executive mentioned gaps in the customer's product listings.

- Executive offered to have the account manager review.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect again and speak to team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, closure, buyleads, alibaba
